body_content.explanation: the quality of being very confident in your behaviour, and liking to be noticed by other people, for example because of the way you dress or talk:
examples: Her flamboyance annoys some people but delights others.
Liberace was famous for his flamboyance on and off stage.

body_content.explanation: the quality of being very noticeable in style, colour, etc.:
examples: This classic Spanish revival building is unique in its elegance and flamboyance.
Some Traviata fans were turned off by the garish flamboyance of the 1998 staging.
